#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#define DIVI 1000000007

using namespace std;

typedef long long int Lint;

int main() {
	
	Lint t, p, yyyy, i, val, m;

	scanf("%lld", &t );

	while( t-- ) {
		
		scanf("%lld %lld", &p, &yyyy );

		val = yyyy - 2000;
		
		for( i = 1;i <= val;i++ ) {
			
			m = ( p * p ) % DIVI;		
			p = m;
		}

		printf("%lld\n", p ); 	
	}

	return 0;
}
